content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
A bit disappointed.   I came to an conclusion that this place is for non-Koreans.  Food are very sweet for Koreans' taste.  Tried three different lunch boxes but all main dishes were sweet.  I tried this place cause I wanted to bring some lunch boxes for my non korean friends a week after so they can try authentic Korean lunch boxes. They might like them who knows but I didnt think they are authentic.  I did not like the food =(I decided to go a different place for lunch box take out.
